name: Rule the Sky for iPad
description:
Rule the Sky™, a Social Networking Game (SNG), where you can care and rule your own floating island in the sky called ‘Flotia’ with your friends.

[INTERESTING FACTORS]
- Floating island in the sky: No more square land, with a unique concept of a floating island that can be designed into any shape!
- Contemplative gameplay through building and controlling your own floating island.
- Five different islands to decorate: Players start from ‘Flotia’ and later can unlocked special themed islands of ‘Glory’, ‘Wonder’, ‘Zombie’ and ‘Flori’!
- Co-op gameplay through social interaction with friends!
- Raining in your region? Then you will also see rain fall in your ‘Flotia’ as well!
- Your kingdom may seem quiet and peaceful, but sometimes a small ruckus is created by zombies and thieves!

[LOADED WITH FEATURES]
- Including roads, fences, decorations and buildings, more than 200 different items to make your ‘Flotia’ more fantastic!
- Activities that create social networks: Doing ‘Favors’ for more rewards and taking ‘Care’ of friends’ farms and/or fruit trees to prevent rotting and being stolen from other users. You can also protect crops with special defense items.
- Manage and expand your island in the sky by farming, building and decorating, while actively communicating with your friends.
- Mini games, such as Finding Thief and Zombie Attack.
- Interactive environment, move the cloud and make rain to fertilize your farm.
- Break the language barrier of making friends; 8 languages are supported!!
English, Korean, Spanish, French, German and Chinese (Simplified and Traditional)
- The 'little bits' of fun:
* Holiday Special Themes
* Time (day and night) system: sun shining days and aurora filled nights.
* Residents with personalities, each responding differently to your action.
* Upgrade Castle & Territory to expand your kingdom; and get extra experience points too!

[Nest]
- Newly polished! Our own unique mobile social gaming platform for finding your friends.
- Nationality information is now shown on Nest list! Know where your friends are from.
- Send messages and post on boards to increase your intimacy with friends! (Boards also support 8 languages)
- Connect to Facebook and post on your Facebook Wall; and find friends listed in Facebook contacts.

Remember, YOU RULE the sky! See you soon on your ‘Flotia’!


* PLEASE NOTE *

Rule the Sky™ allow you to purchase in-game-items for real money.
Please disable in-app-purchase on your device if you don’t want this feature to be accessible.

Online Game: internet connection (3G+ or Wifi) is required.
